ace where are u ok plz run me by this step by step plz like how do u extract the iso from the rar files plz help?

OK what I use is a program called winrar.
you can get it from RARlabs.
you install that and open the first file its 
simpsons movie.part01.rar
then inside that archive (its 1 spread over many files for security) you extract everything thats in there to its own folder. then you just burn it to a dvd, most people use nero, but it doesnt really matter what. If u are using roxio you have to "copy" a dvd, and point it to the folders.
sorry for any confusion... i know next time ill make an ISO
what website is the rarlabs at? and how do i open the winrar?and do i have to download the simpsons movie again or no?
ace i downloaded the winrar then found the simpons movie in downloads and then opened the simpsons movie.part01.rar but all it shows is audio_ts and video_ts wat do i do now?
wat do i do now?
wat do i do now do i have to have a certein program to write the file to the disk because when i tryed to write it from the my computer thing it says put in a cd-rw disk so wat do i do?

OK you need a DVD-R to burn it to DVD.
which means you need a DVD-R drive. And like i said in my previous post, use NERO or Roxio to burn the DVD Video Folder.
if you just want to watch it on your computer however, you can extract all the files in the video_ts folder, and open the big VOB files in Media player. They are MPEG video files just over a Gig in size. play one after the other to get the movie.

and since this is a DVD and states DVD in its titile, and in every post ive given you yes you need a DVD burner, unless like i said previously, you watch it on your computer, the only thing you can do is burn it onto a DVD.
